item.title: JobSearchLog
item.description: JobSearchLog is a SPA application written in Angular 6 with a material interface using Google Firebase as a backend. The application can track job applications, interviews, multiple copy of the resume and cover letters and all the stuff that is usually done when searching for a new job. Skeleton Securing Job Resume
